content:
TITLE: Generating a Library with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate a new shared library within an Nx workspace using the React plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx g @nx/react:lib my-lib
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Dependency Graph with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to visualize the dependency relationships between projects in an Nx workspace.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx dep-graph
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a React Application with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate a new React application within an Nx workspace using the React plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx g @nx/react:app my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Development Server with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to serve an application in development mode with automatic reloading on source file changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx serve my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building an Application with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to build an application with Nx, producing output in the dist directory. Includes option for production builds.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx build my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a React Component with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to scaffold a new React component within a specific project using the React plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx g @nx/react:component my-component --project=my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Affected Unit Tests with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests only for projects affected by recent changes, improving test efficiency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx affected:test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Affected End-to-End Tests with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute end-to-end tests only for projects affected by recent changes, improving test efficiency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx affected:e2e
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing React Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the React plugin for Nx workspace to enable React application and library development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nx/react
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Angular Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Angular plugin for Nx workspace to enable Angular application and library development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nx/angular
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running End-to-End Tests with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Cypress end-to-end tests for a specific application within an Nx workspace.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx e2e my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Jest unit tests for a specific application within an Nx workspace.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nx test my-app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Web Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Web plugin for Nx workspace to enable framework-agnostic web frontend development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nx/web
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Nest.js Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Nest.js plugin for Nx workspace to enable Nest.js application and library development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nrwl/nest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Express Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Express plugin for Nx workspace to enable Express application and library development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nrwl/express
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Node Plugin for Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Node plugin for Nx workspace to enable Node.js application and library development capabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @nrwl/node
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests Command for shared-product-state Library
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the shared-product-state library in an Nx workspace using Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/product/state/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-product-state
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Unit Tests with Angular CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the shared-product-ui library using Jest test runner via Angular CLI
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/product/ui/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-product-ui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Products Home Page Library with Angular CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the products-home-page library using Angular CLI. This command must be run from the project root directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/products/home-page/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test products-home-page
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Unit Tests for Shared Product Data Library
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the shared-product-data library using Jest as the test runner. The command is run through the Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/product/data/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-product-data
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Shared Header Library in Nx
DESCRIPTION: This command executes unit tests for the shared-header library using Jest as the test runner. It's run within the Nx project environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/header/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
ng test shared-header
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Shared Cart State Library in Nx
DESCRIPTION: This command executes the unit tests for the shared-cart-state library in an Nx workspace. It uses the Angular CLI to run the tests specifically for this library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/cart/state/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
ng test shared-cart-state
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Products Product Detail Page Library
DESCRIPTION: Executes the unit tests for the 'products-product-detail-page' library using the Angular CLI. This command is typically used in an Nx workspace to run tests for a specific library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/products/product-detail-page/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
ng test products-product-detail-page
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for cart-cart-page Library
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the cart-cart-page library using Jest within an Nx project environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/cart/cart-page/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
ng test cart-cart-page
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests for shared-product-types with Angular CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Jest-based unit tests for the shared-product-types library using Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/product/types/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-product-types
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Unit Tests for shared-product-e2e-utils
DESCRIPTION: Command for executing the unit tests for the shared-product-e2e-utils library using Jest test runner integrated with Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/e2e-utils/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-product-e2e-utils
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Tests for Shared Styles Library
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the shared-styles library using Jest test runner through Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/styles/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
ng test shared-styles
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests Command for shared-jsxify Library
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the shared-jsxify library using Jest test runner through Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/jsxify/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-jsxify
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Unit Tests for Shared Assets Library
DESCRIPTION: Command for executing unit tests for the shared-assets library using Jest as the test runner, via the Angular CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nrwl/nx-examples/blob/master/libs/shared/assets/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ng test shared-assets
```
